mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE( T1.USER_SEQ, 0 ) AS USER_SEQ FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1), USER_SEQ FROM TB_USER_MNG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd} ) T1

SELECT BUCKET_SEQ, USER_SEQ, BUCKET_NM, BUCKET_DSCR, REP_IMG_URL, REG_DTTM, DEL_YN, (CASE WHEN Count(*) OVER() > ( #{stNo} + #{searchCnt} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MORE_YN FROM TB_BUCKET_MNG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY BUCKET_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{stNo}, #{searchCnt}
SELECT BUCKET_NM, REP_IMG_URL, BUCKET_DSCR FROM TB_BUCKET WHERE BUCKET_SEQNO = #{bucketSeqno} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TBS.BUCKET_STORY_SEQNO DESC) AS no, TBS.SOTRY_DSCR, TBS.IMG_URL, (CASE WHEN Count(*) OVER() > ( #{stNo} + #{searchCnt} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MORE_YN, TBU.USER_ID, TBU.NAME FROM TB_BUCKET TB INNER JOIN TB_BUCKET_STORY TBS ON TBS.BUCKET_SEQNO = TB.BUCKET_SEQNO LEFT JOIN TB_BUCKET_USER TBU ON TBU.USER_SEQNO = TB.USER_SEQNO WHERE TBS.BUCKET_SEQNO = #{bucketSeqno} AND TBS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TBU.DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT #{stNo}, #{searchCnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BUCKET_MNG (BUCKET_SEQ, USER_SEQ, BUCKET_NM, BUCKET_DSCR, REP_IMG_URL, REG_DTTM, DEL_YN) VALUES (NEXTVAL(TB_BUCKET_MNG_SEQUENCE), '1', #{bucketNm}, '', #{repImgUrl}, now(), 'N')
INSERT INTO TB_STORY_MNG (BUCKET_SEQNO, SOTRY_DSCR, IMG_URL, REG_DTTM, DEL_YN) VALUES (#{bucketSeqno}, #{storyDscr}, #{imgUrl}, now(), 'N');
